posts.title: The Problems Seekive Helps to Solve
posts.author: Marc Shave, Seekive
content: We live in a time of endless possibilities. Entertainment, events, food, nature, adventures — the world is overflowing with opportunities. Yet many of us feel stuck in routines, disconnected from our communities, or overwhelmed by the sheer number of choices in front of us.
Seekive was created to solve that problem — and many more. It's not just another app. It's a tool for discovery, connection, and resilience, designed for today and the world that's coming tomorrow.

posts.title: Testing the Latest Page
posts.author: Marc Shave, Seekive
content: Just testing out this new blog section to make sure everything works as expected. Posts should flow nicely down the page with the right spacing and styling.
This is what a typical post will look like once I start sharing regular updates about the Seekive journey.
